name: CJCJ Juvenile Justice Services (JJS)
description: CJCJ's Juvenile Justice Services will collaboratively serve youth and TAY involved in the justice system, and provide them with reentry support as they return home. Staff will provide case planning, linkages, and case management services while also providing court advocacy for the youth. Support can include educational reengagement, workforce development, independent living and life-skills coaching, mentorship, and aftercare support, all dependent on the youth's individual circumstances.
